public static void makeQuickGraphBySteps(String label,
                                         double[] numbers,
                                         float stepAmount)
This will print out a graph of a double dataset in the console based on a sepcified number of steps

Parameters:
label - The label for the console output of this graph
numbers - The double[] of the numbers
stepAmount - The amount to step each grouping

Parameters:

isInsidePolygon

public static boolean isInsidePolygon(PVector pos,
                                      PVector[] verticesIn)
Checks whether a PVector lies within the bounds of a outline defined by an array of PVectors

Parameters:
pos - A PVector that is to be tested
verticesIn - The PVector[] that defines the planar polygon
Returns:
true if the PVector is in the outline
